org.athrun.android.framework.webview
类 WebUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.athrun.android.framework.webview.WebUtils

public class WebUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Contains web related methods. Examples are: enterTextIntoWebElement(), getWebTexts(), getWebElements().

作者：
xiaoliang.chenxl

构造方法详细信息

WebUtils

public WebUtils(android.app.Instrumentation instrumentation,
                ActivityUtils activityUtils,
                ViewFetcher viewFetcher)
Constructs this object

参数：

activityUtils - the ActivityUtils instance
viewFetcher - the ViewFetcher instance
方法详细信息

getTextViewsFromWebView

public java.util.ArrayList<android.widget.TextView> getTextViewsFromWebView()
Returns TextView} objects based on web elements shown in the present WebViews

参数：
onlyFromVisibleWebViews - true if only from visible WebViews
返回：
an ArrayList of TextViews created from the present WebViews

getCurrentWebElements

public java.util.ArrayList<WebElement> getCurrentWebElements()
Returns an ArrayList of WebElements currently shown in the active WebView.

返回：
an ArrayList of the WebElement objects currently shown in the active WebView

getCurrentWebElements

public java.util.ArrayList<WebElement> getCurrentWebElements(By by)
Returns an ArrayList of WebElements of the specified By object currently shown in the active WebView.

参数：
by - the By object.
返回：
an ArrayList of the WebElement objects currently shown in the active WebView

prepareForStartOfJavascriptExecution

public java.lang.String prepareForStartOfJavascriptExecution()
Prepares for start of JavaScript execution

返回：
the JavaScript as a String

enterTextIntoWebElement

public void enterTextIntoWebElement(By by,
                                    java.lang.String text)
Enters text into a web element using the given By method

参数：
by - the By object.
text - the text to enter

executeJavaScriptFunction

public boolean executeJavaScriptFunction(java.lang.String function)
Executes the given JavaScript function

参数：
function - the function as a String
返回：
true if JavaScript function was executed

isWebElementSufficientlyShown

public final boolean isWebElementSufficientlyShown(WebElement webElement)
Returns true if the view is sufficiently shown

参数：
view - the view to check
返回：
true if the view is sufficiently shown

splitNameByUpperCase

public java.lang.String splitNameByUpperCase(java.lang.String name)
Splits a name by upper case.

参数：
name - the name to split
返回：
a String with the split name

hideSoftKeyboard

public void hideSoftKeyboard(boolean shouldSleepFirst)
Hides the soft keyboard

参数：
shouldSleepFirst - whether to sleep a default pause first
